General.Name: Top Wealth Group Holding Limited Ordinary Shares
General.Description: Top Wealth Group Holding Limited provides caviar and caviar-based gourmet products in Hong Kong and internationally. The company trades in caviars; and offers its products under the Imperial Cristal Caviar brand name. It serves food and beverage related distributors. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Sai Wan, Hong Kong. Top Wealth Group Holding Limited operates as a subsidiary of Winwin Development Group Limited.
General.Address: Hong Kong Plaza, Sai Wan, Hong Kong
